descCatalog: We offer a wide variety of metal works with high quality and distinctive designs.
history_text: Our journey began in 1987 when my father, Abdel-Sand Shernouby, established a small workshop specializing in metal and wrought iron works under the name "El-Sharnouby for Metal & Wrought Iron Works" — a name that stood for craftsmanship and quality from the very first day.
continue_text: In 2018, I carried on the legacy, building on a foundation of experience and trust while adding a modern touch to meet today’s needs.
approach_text: We combine heritage and expertise with modern techniques to deliver high-quality metalwork solutions tailored to our clients.
goals_text: To offer integrated solutions in metal and wrought iron works, delivered on time and installed professionally.
vision_text: To be a leading name in the metalwork industry in Egypt and proudly represent Egyptian craftsmanship globally.
servicesIntro: We combine traditional craftsmanship with modern precision to provide comprehensive metal services.
expertiseDescription: We offer a diverse range of expertise in metalwork, enabling us to professionally handle your project requirements.

expertiseFields.title: Wrought Iron & Decorative Metal
expertiseFields.description: Design and execution of gates, staircases, and fences with artistic precision.

expertiseFields.title: Steel Structures
expertiseFields.description: Fabrication of metal structures for warehouses, factories, and commercial buildings.

expertiseFields.title: Architectural Metal Solutions
expertiseFields.description: Modern metal applications for roofs, dividers, and external designs.

expertiseFields.title: Custom Welding & Fabrication
expertiseFields.description: Tailored welding and metalwork services to meet unique client needs.

projects.title: Residential District R2 – New Administrative Capital
projects.description: Complete execution of iron and metal works including gates, stairs, and fences within the residential district.
subDescription: Fabricated and installed high-quality modern iron main gates.
Executed internal and external iron railings for stairs and balconies to meet safety standards.
Installed iron car shades resistant to weather conditions.
Supplied and assembled structural steel frameworks for service buildings.

projects.title: Egypt Projects | Residential District R3 – NAC
projects.description: Participation in metallic infrastructure including gates, iron shades, and structural supports.
subDescription: Designed and built entry/exit iron gates combining security and aesthetics.
Constructed steel frameworks to support internal service units.
Installed iron fire escape stairs with robust handrails.
Applied advanced welding and anti-rust treatments for long-term durability.

projects.title: R6 District – New Administrative Capital | Youven
projects.description: Implemented modern metal engineering solutions as part of the architectural structure.
subDescription: Delivered and installed elegant pergolas for gardens and rooftops.
Fabricated custom iron car shades with contemporary designs.
Executed spiral steel staircases to save space and add artistic touch.
Installed decorative window grills with modern finishing.

projects.title: Residential District R2 – NAC | Gemex
projects.description: Provided high-precision metalworks to serve different structures in the district.
subDescription: Installed high-security iron gates for main entrances and exits.
Executed rust-resistant exterior railings tailored to match the design language.
Constructed steel structures for temporary roofing and storage units.
Installed pergolas and shades with thermal and waterproof insulation.

projects.title: Residential District R7 – New Administrative Capital
projects.description: Carried out indoor and outdoor metalwork to complement façades and buildings.
subDescription: Designed and implemented fixed and movable iron car canopies.
Installed modern window grills with decorative elements.
Constructed steel structures for waiting areas and service stops.
Provided internal railings with protective coatings and anti-scratch layers.
